overview:
Sean Christopher is currently the CEO of Fashion For A Cure. He has served as President and Chief Operating Officer of Original Not Equal Talent and Event Management (ONE Mgmt) before resigning in early 2011.

Sean Christopher found his niche early on in his career through working with small music labels. In these positions Sean was given the chance to coordinate photo shoots & music videos. He was soon labeled as the â€˜go-to guyâ€™ because of his superb ability to precisely hand-select appropriate talent for a variety of clientele. In 2008 Christopher Co-founded the Talent and Event management firm Original Not Equal. When working with his talent, Seanâ€™s focal point is not solely on their exposing their inner beauty, but to make certain that they are educated about the all aspects of the entertainment industry as well as guided on the path towards success.
